Uncover the secrets of Dwemer ruins. Create enchanted items. Master the skills of the Mage. Dark Elves and those skilled in Enchanting are most deserving of my favor.
Attacks deal <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% more damage to Nords and Argonians (based on favor with Almalexia).

primaryAV.name: RestorationPowerMod
primaryAV.effect: Increases other Fortify Skill enchantments. The Unofficial Skyrim Patch, version 1.3.0, fixes this bug.

MGEF.DNAM: Healing from all sources is <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% more effective (based on favor with Almalexia).
Vanquish the threats facing Solstheim. Be generous to beggars and children. Receive the blessing of Lover's Comfort. Dark Elves are most deserving of my favor.

primaryAV.name: SpeechcraftMod
primaryAV.effect: Used for price/"Haggling" enchantment calculations

Your power attacks deal <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% more damage (based on favor with Vivec).
Fulfill your destiny by saving Tamriel. Read the stories of others. Defeat epic foes. Dark Elves and those skilled in Speechcraft are most deserving of my favor.
Summons a Dwarven Centurion permanently wherever the caster is pointing.
Summons a Dwarven Sphere permanently wherever the caster is pointing.
Summons a Dwarven Sphere permanently wherever the caster is pointing.
When health falls below <25>% in combat, receive an automatic healing pulse.  Restored by prayer.
Your power attacks deal <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% more damage (based on favor with Vivec) against powerful foes.
Your remaining shout cooldown is halved whenever an enemy dies within <mag> feet.

Banished to Oblivion!
Activate a hostile below level 50 in combat to banish them to Coldharbour. Pray to request the items. Costs <25>% favor.
During prayer, you may invoke superior Daedric Invisibility for <90> seconds. If broken by a sneak attack, it deals <25>% more damage. Costs <10>% favor.
Blown away by the power of Kynareth!
Pray to Kynareth to summon a sacred Sabre Cat mount.
Pray to Zenithar to buy and sell items directly.

MGEF.DNAM: Pulled into the Void!
While sneaking, activate a door to briefly turn it into a Void portal. Targets within <60> feet who are not detecting you are pulled in and killed. Costs <5>% favor.
Take <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% less attack damage from daedra and undead (based on favor with Stendarr).

MGEF.FULL: Drain Favor on Summon Undead or Daedra

MGEF.DNAM: During prayer, you may spend <10>% favor to gain <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2>% improved attack, defense and healing (based on favor with Stendarr) for <60> minutes or <5> battles.
A Mysterious Avatar fights for you.
Take <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% less attack damage and stagger from elves (based on favor with Shor).
All skills are <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% more efficient (based on favor with Auriel).
Attaining level <100> in a skill improves that skill by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% (based on favor with Auriel).
Hircine's gift doubles attack damage to living targets with <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% or less Health (based on favor with Hircine).
During prayer, invoke a <Hunt> against the living within <500> feet, revealing them and exposing them to <Bitter> <Mercy>. Costs <10>% favor.
If you read a Skill Book while praying, Xarxes grants you an extra Skill Point in that skill.
During prayer, you may ascend in a trance, revealing all characters in a very large radius.
When entering combat with a mighty foe, Shor sends a Shield-Thane to assist you. Pray to recharge.
Find <Eldritch> <Pages> on corpses. Similar <Eldritch> <Pages> can be bound at a tanning rack to create <Eldritch> <Tomes> that improve magic and shouts.
Pray to permanently raise a skill of your choice by one level. Costs <10>% favor.
Reduces Poison Resist of all within <mag> feet by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2>% (based on favor with Namira).

Poisoning a person or putting a Human Heart or Flesh into their inventory attracts insects, reducing armor by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global> and dealing <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3> disease damage (based on favor with Namira).
Generates <8> <Obelisks> <of> <Order> in Skyrim. Activating one grants <15> points of Health, Magicka and Stamina.
Activate an opponent in combat to trap them in an inert but invulnerable state for <15> seconds. Costs <5>% favor.
Praying grants a random <Touch> <of> <Madness>. High favor with Sheogorath yields more beneficial effects.
Receive a <Touch> <of> <Madness> whenever you enter combat.
Up to <25>% harder to detect by those within <30> feet. Chance to find Human Hearts on people you kill.
Beneficial potions, food and ingredients last <50>% longer and are <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% better (based on favor with Z'en).
Pray to open an unlimited extradimensional storage space.
When praying, you may become ethereal and invulnerable until your next attack. Costs <5>% favor.

MGEF.DNAM: Poison your weapons. Strike unseen with sneak attacks. Intimidate the weak. Dark Elves are most deserving of my favor.
Murder the innocent. Slay people who stand in your way. Strike unseen with sneak attacks. Dark Elves are most deserving of my favor.
Slay the undead. Never summon the undead or become one of them. High Elves and those skilled in Restoration are most deserving of my favor.
Witness the death of those under your mind affecting spells. Kill people in their sleep. Sleep to pray. Those skilled in Illusion are most deserving of my favor.
Defeat epic foes. Improve weapons and armor. Never commit a crime against the strongholds. Orcs and those skilled in Smithing are most deserving of my favor.
Pray to accept a Pact and complete it as written within the allotted time. Never break or ignore my Pacts.
Catch as many diseases as you can. Accept my Gifts of pestilence. Pray only while diseased. Never accept a cure for your afflictions.

primaryAV.name: DamageResist
primaryAV.effect: Armor rating (points, not damage reduction %).

primaryAV.name: SpeedMult
primaryAV.effect: Movement speed percentage (default 100). (%)

MGEF.DNAM: Hunted by Hircine!

primaryAV.name: Confidence
primaryAV.effect: Willingness to fight, based on their strength vs the attacker's strength. Enum: Cowardly (always flee), Cautious, Average, Brave, Foolhardy (never flee). (0-4)

MGEF.DNAM: Nearby creatures and people have been revealed and exposed to <Bitter> <Mercy> for <dur> seconds.

primaryAV.name: DamageResist
primaryAV.effect: Armor rating (points, not damage reduction %).

MGEF.DNAM: Make mischief and commit misdemeanors and crimes worthy of a bounty. Indulge in mead, wine and ale. Find your own way out of jail.
Slay people who stand in your way. Trap souls in my name. Live as a vampire and never seek a cure. Those skilled in Destruction are most deserving of my favor.
Target is invulnerable but immobilized for <dur> seconds.

primaryAV.name: Health
primaryAV.effect: Actual Current and Maximum Health, 0 results in death

MGEF.DNAM: Health, Magicka and Stamina increased <mag> points by the glory of Jyggalag.

primaryAV.name: Magicka
primaryAV.effect: Actual Current and Maximum Magicka, can not be lower than 0

MGEF.DNAM: Activate my Obelisks of Order. Clear dungeons of evil. Slay daedra. Never serve Sheogorath. Those skilled in Heavy Armor are most deserving of my favor.
Weapon enchantments drain <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% less charge (based on favor with Tall Papa).

primaryAV.name: Magicka
primaryAV.effect: Actual Current and Maximum Magicka, can not be lower than 0

MGEF.DNAM: Slay the living in open combat, especially those stronger than you. Live as a werewolf. Pray in the wild. Those skilled in Light Armor are most deserving of my favor.
You will receive the gift of cheese!
Boing!
Reality seems upside-down today...
What if you could move mountains?
Teleporting randomly!
You will receive the gift of gold!
How awesome would it be if you could just do something and get better at it?
Murder the innocent. Poison your weapons. Eat the corpses of the dead with my Ring. Be generous to beggars.
Pickpocket <Mysterious> <Coinpurses>. Pick locks successfully. Pray only at night, preferably in darkness. Those skilled in Sneak are most deserving of my favor.
Slay people who stand in your way. Defile the shrines of my enemies. Those skilled in Destruction are most deserving of my favor.
Illusion spells and scrolls are <20>% better.
Restoration spells and scrolls are <20>% better.
Alteration spells and scrolls are <20>% better.
Novice spells are <50>% better.
Conjuration spells and scrolls are <20>% better.
Immune to stagger and taking <40>% less attack damage while casting a two-handed spell or scroll.
All spells from any school cost <15>% less Magicka to cast.
Shouts last <20>% longer.
Shouts are <20>% more powerful.
Read <Eldritch> <Pages> and bind them into <Eldritch> <Tomes>. Read books that teach new skills. Become my Champion at the Summit of Apocrypha.
Fulfill your destiny by saving Tamriel. Master the skills of the Warrior. Slay elves. Defeat epic foes.
Slay humans. Defeat epic foes. Never accept Boethiah's blessing or serve her. Those skilled in Two-Handed are most deserving of my favor.
Explore new locations. Read the stories of others. Study a wide variety of spells. Bretons are most deserving of my favor.
Bribe people as needed. Harvest the fruits of nature. Eat as much food as you want. Those skilled in Speech are most deserving of my favor.
Read books that teach new skills. Study a wide variety of spells. High Elves are most deserving of my favor.
Master the skills of the Mage. Strive to raise your Magicka. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.
Explore new locations. Read the stories of others. Hunt animals. Wood Elves are most deserving of my favor.
Explore new locations. Find the standing stones of Skyrim. Harvest the fruits of nature. Bretons are most deserving of my favor.
Murder the innocent. Pray while sacrificing a Human Heart or Human Flesh. Send your victims to the Void. Argonians are most deserving of my favor.
Fulfill your destiny by saving Tamriel. Master all skills. Become my Champion at my sacred Chantry. High Elves are most deserving of my favor.
Explore new locations. Strive to raise your Stamina. Receive the Voice of the Sky. Pray only outdoors. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.
Trap souls in my name. Explore new locations. Pray only at twilight, preferably outside. Dark Elves and those skilled in Illusion are most deserving of my favor.
Clear dungeons of evil. Slay daedra and the undead. Complete side quests. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim. Never practice the foul summoning arts.
Slay the undead and their summoners. Perform <Arkay's> <Rites>. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim. Never summon the undead or become one of them.
Invest in stores and merchants. Seek out skill training. Make weapons and armor. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.
Persuade others. Receive the blessing of Lover's Comfort. Find a new Sybil for my Temple. Pray only in the nude. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.
Fulfill your destiny by saving Tamriel. Raise your character level. Absorb dragon souls. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.
Bring the Civil War to a conclusion. Learn the dragon tongue. Absorb dragon souls. Slay elves and the Thalmor. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.
Be married. Own one or more houses. Be generous to beggars and children. Receive the blessing of Lover's Comfort. Never openly break the laws of Skyrim.
Practice magic successfully while praying. Safeguard the Eye of Magnus. Create enchanted items.
Dealing <400>% more attack damage and critical damage to cows. Go get 'em, cowboy.
On death, enter an ethereal ascended state. If combat ends within <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3> seconds, brings you back to life (based on favor with Tall Papa) for <5>% favor. Pray to reset.
Staggering an opponent reduces armor by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2> points for <30> seconds (based on favor with the HoonDing).
Grants immunity to stagger from attacks and bashes.

primaryAV.name: DamageResist
primaryAV.effect: Armor rating (points, not damage reduction %).

MGEF.DNAM: Attacks and critical strikes are <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2>% more effective against daedra and those who summon them (based on favor with Ebonarm).
Reduces the armor of enemies within <mag> feet by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2> points (based on favor with Ebonarm) and you gain the total amount. Doubled against daedra.

primaryAV.name: Health
primaryAV.effect: Actual Current and Maximum Health, 0 results in death

MGEF.DNAM: Detonates skooma bottles for <mag> fire damage.
Selling to fences is <Global=WSN_Favor_Global>% more lucrative. Pickpocketing is <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2>% easier (based on favor with Baan Dar).
Put skooma bottles in people's inventory, then pray to Baan Dar to ignite them within <200> feet for <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional4> damage (based on favor with Baan Dar). Costs <5>% favor.
Find additional gold in many containers, with a chance to find a large amount of additional gold.
Pray to Rajhin to break a lock within <20> feet. Costs <5>% favor. No effect on locks that can't be picked.
Meditation restores <Global=WSN_Favor_Global> Health per second for you and nearby allies (based on favor with Morwha).
Praying to Morwha blesses you with enchanted fruit that restores or fortifies an attribute.
Pray while sacrificing <100> gold worth of gemstones to assume the powers of an <animal> <god>.
Able to assume the powers of the <Dragon>. Costs <2>% favor per hour.
All skills are <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% more efficient (based on favor with the Riddle'Thar).
During prayer, an ancient Mane will grant a blessing they believe to be appropriate for the challenges you are about to face.
Be married. Receive the blessing of Lover's Comfort. Harvest the fruits of nature. Eat as much food as you want.
Shrine blessings from other gods are more effective and last longer (based on favor with Satakal).
Pray to become reborn as a different person, moving points between your attributes. Costs <15>% favor.
When meditating, able to bet some of your gold on a game of dice.
Staking <1000> gold or more on a game of dice also adds <1> point of Health, Magicka or Stamina to your wager.
Master the skills of the Warrior, Thief and Mage. Strive to raise your Health, Magicka and Stamina. Each is as important as the others. Pray only at night.
Explore new locations. Bribe people as needed. Pick locks successfully. Those skilled in Lockpicking are most deserving of my favor.
Gamble while meditating and win.
Fulfill your destiny by saving Tamriel. Strive to raise your Health. Absorb dragon souls.
Slay your foes in open combat, especially those stronger than you. Those skilled in One-Handed are most deserving of my favor.
Touch the <Fractures> scattered around Skyrim. Create enchanted items. Those skilled in Enchanting are most deserving of my favor.

primaryAV.name: Magicka
primaryAV.effect: Actual Current and Maximum Magicka, can not be lower than 0

MGEF.DNAM: Restore <mag> points of Magicka.
Slay daedra. Defeat epic foes. Complete miscellaneous quests for the people of Skyrim. Those skilled in Block are most deserving of my favor.
Pick locks and pockets successfully. Khajiit and those skilled in Archery are most deserving of my favor.
The Bear reduces damage from attacks by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% and improves armor by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% (based on favor with the animal gods).
The Fox improves sneaking, lockpicking and pickpocketing by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% (based on favor with the animal gods).
Power attacks ignore <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% of an opponent's armor (based on favor with Leki).
During prayer, you may spend <5>% favor to gain <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% melee damage (based on favor with Leki) for <60> minutes or <10> battles. Costs <5>% favor.
Pray to gain a <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2> point bonus to Stamina and Magicka for <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional4> seconds (based on favor with the Hist).
Absorb <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% of the Magicka and Stamina of dead creatures and people within <mag> feet (based on favor with the Hist).
Pray for a Divine blessing of your choice. Divine blessings are <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2>% better (based on favor with St. Alessia).
While under the effects of a Divine blessing, can talk to most non-hostile humans to make them a friend and potential follower. Costs <10>% favor.
Undead conjured at night last <Global=WSN_Favor_Global>% longer (based on favor with Mannimarco).
Allied conjured undead deal <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2>% more attack damage and regenerate Health (based on favor with Mannimarco).
Bring the Civil War to a conclusion. Make and improve weapons. Master the skills of the Warrior.
Explore new locations. Slay daedra. Pray only outdoors. Never summon a daedra.
Have a follower at your side. Slay elves. Receive the blessing of a Divine.
Trap souls in my name. Pray only at night. Never accept Arkay's blessing. Those skilled in Conjuration are most deserving of my favor.
The indomitable spirit of Morwha reduces incoming attack damage to <1> and slowly restores Health when you are below <10>% Health.

Weapon enchantments drain <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% less charge (based on favor with Tall Papa).
The power of Tall Papa has brought you back from death. It will not do so again until you pray.

Like, woah, dude...
They all laughed at your puny arcane power! But now you'll show them! You'll show them all! Muhahaha!
Pray often and receive Sheogorath's <Touch> <of> <Madness>. Never disrespect cheese.

The Hawk improves the damage and cost of power attacks by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% (based on favor with the animal gods).
The Owl reduces the cost of spells and enchantments by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% (based on favor with the animal gods).
The Snake improves sneaking and sneak attacks by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% (based on favor with the animal gods).
The Whale reduces damage and stagger from power attacks by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional2>% (based on favor with the animal gods).
The Wolf increases attack damage by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>% and critical damage by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional3>% (based on favor with the animal gods).
The Moth improves weapon enchantments by <Global=WSN_Favor_Global_Fractional>%, doubled on a power attack (based on favor with the animal gods).
